main_definition: To provide or hand over something to someone as a gift, payment, or in exchange for something else.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To transfer possession of an object or responsibility from oneself to another person.
meanings_and_examples.example: She gave her friend the keys to her house while she was away.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To provide or offer something, often as a gift or reward.
meanings_and_examples.example: He gave his sister flowers on her birthday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make available for use, typically through distribution to consumers or users.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company gave out free samples of their new product at the trade show.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a financial context, to transfer money from one account to another.
meanings_and_examples.example: She gave him $20 as payment for helping her move.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To donate or contribute something, typically in the form of money, goods, or services.
meanings_and_examples.example: The charity organization gave a large sum to support their cause.
